entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is sitting on a desk by the wall, and Harry didn't notice him at first. He is smiling when he talks to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is desperate to get to the mirror and doesn't notice Dumbledore at first. He is relieved to see that Dumbledore is smiling.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is shown in the Mirror of Erised as Head Boy.

entities.name: mirror of erised
entities.description: The Mirror of Erised shows Harry his family and Ron as Head Boy. It also shows what people desire or wish for.

relationships.description: The Mirror of Erised shows Harry his family.
